com.sudoplay.axion.util

Class TypeResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.util.TypeResolver

  • public class TypeResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to find all super classes and super interfaces of a given class.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor
